summary: This bill, H.R. 616, proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. The core of the bill focuses on increasing the tax credit for energy-efficient home improvements. Specifically, it seeks to double the dollar limitation for the energy efficient home improvement credit related to heat pumps, heat pump water heaters, biomass stoves, and boilers. The amendment applies to taxable years starting after December 31, 2024.
